race/ethnicity.description: The race or ethnicity group the student belongs to

value_dict.group D: The student belongs to ethnicity group D
value_dict.group B: The student belongs to ethnicity group B
value_dict.group C: The student belongs to ethnicity group C
value_dict.group E: The student belongs to ethnicity group E
value_dict.group A: The student belongs to ethnicity group A

parental level of education.description: The highest level of education achieved by the student's parents

value_dict.some college: The highest level of education achieved by the parents is some college
value_dict.associate's degree: The highest level of education achieved by the parents is an associate's degree
value_dict.some high school: The highest level of education achieved by the parents is some high school
value_dict.bachelor's degree: The highest level of education achieved by the parents is a bachelor's degree
value_dict.master's degree: The highest level of education achieved by the parents is a master's degree
value_dict.high school: The highest level of education achieved by the parents is high school

lunch.description: Indicates whether the student has a standard or free/reduced lunch

value_dict.standard: The student has a standard lunch
value_dict.free/reduced: The student has a free or reduced lunch

test preparation course.description: Indicates whether the student has completed a test preparation course or not

value_dict.completed: The student has completed a test preparation course
value_dict.none: The student has not completed a test preparation course

math score.description: The student's score in mathematics, out of 100

reading score.description: The student's score in reading, out of 100

writing score.description: The student's score in writing, out of 100

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in student performance prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the student, please predict the math score.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in student performance prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the student, please predict the reading score.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in student performance prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the student, please predict the writing score.
